docs.snippet: The popularity of free products at sporting events has led to an arms race to develop the most entertaining and marketable T-shirt cannon....
docs.lead_paragraph: The popularity of free products at sporting events has led to an arms race to develop the most entertaining and marketable T-shirt cannon.
docs.abstract: Popularity of free products at sporting events has led to an arms race to develop the most entertaining and marketable T-shirt cannon; in almost every NBA and many college arenas this season, multicylinder T-shirt cannons, modeled after the Civil War-era Gatling guns, have become regular presence during timeouts and halftime shows.

headline.main: Crowd-Pleasing Blasts, With Civil War Roots
headline.print_headline: Crowd-Pleasing Blasts, With Civil War Roots
